p: Peripheral flow cytometry commonly shows decreased CD4 and CD8 cell counts, but an increase in Th17 cell proportion [ 29•]. Th17 cells are helper T cells differentiated from Th0 cells mainly stimulated by IL-6 and IL-23 [ 33]. Inflammatory cytokines like IL-6, IL-10, IL-2, and IFNγ increased in severe cases.
